description:
Our award-winning team at Gary C. Johnson, P.S.C., has secured millions of dollars for people in and around Pikeville, Kentucky, who have suffered a personal injury. We combine decades of experience going to trial or negotiating settlements on behalf of people who are at their most vulnerable. The caseload at our law firm includes car accidents, nursing home abuse, defective products, medical malpractice, birth injuries, mass torts and premises liability.

Our law firm's proven results include the following:

  • Securing more than $500 million in settlements and awards for our clients
  • Securing the largest personal injury verdict in the state
  • Rejecting initial offers from insurance providers and obtaining significantly more

We use "judo law" against our opponents. In other words, we use the strengths of the defendant against them. This is a proven method that has worked against trucking companies, medical providers, property owners, drug companies and insurance companies.

Our attorneys hold a number of honors, such as becoming members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, holding an Avvo "Superb" rating, and being selected for inclusion in the Super Lawyers list. This is due in part to our willingness to go the extra mile for our clients, such as helping them through issues such as car repairs, working with insurance adjusters and communicating with bill collectors.

Gary C. Johnson, P.S.C., offers free initial consultations. Our law firm operates on a contingency fee basis, which means we only collect a fee if we win a claim.
